content.task: Analyze the current CI pipeline failures systematically. We have code formatting and security report validation issues. The fresh bandit report shows 0 HIGH severity issues but tests are failing due to stale reports and JSON import issues. Provide comprehensive analysis and systematic remediation strategy.
content.context: User requested strict adherence to project rules and compliance requirements. DEVELOPMENT_RULES.md mandates NEVER SKIP FAILING TESTS. Current CI failures: 1) Code formatting (black/isort) - FIXED, 2) Security report validation failures in test_security_reports.py. Fresh bandit scan shows 0 HIGH severity issues but tests use stale reports.
